chapter.title: Possible issues
chapter.para: In this chapter you will find a list of most popular issues that can appear while the process of migration,

section.title: Visual Editor starts with "Missing Natures" message dialog
section.para: While opening existing projects or creating new ones with some standard eclipse wizards this message can appear:

This message shows that some functionality of Visual Editor may not work if a project doesn't have org.jboss.tools.jsf.jsfnature or org.jboss.tools.jst.web.kb.kbnature in .project configuration. To fix this problem and turn off the message box execute the following steps:

listitem.para: Right click the project in Package Explorer.
Select Configure -> Add JSF Capabilities from the context menu.
Configure your project using Add JSF Capabilities wizard and press Finish
